name: Urouge
text: During your turn: When your field has 2 or more DON!! cards, when a DON!! card is returned to the deck, add 1 DON!! card from the deck to the rest area. Then, activate your Purple Stage 1 card.

effect.text: When your field has 2 or more DON!! cards, when a DON!! card is returned to the deck, add 1 DON!! card from the deck to the rest area. Then, activate your Purple Stage 1 card.

meta.notes: Card marked as SAMPLE, not for sale. Text is in Japanese. Rarity is R (Rare).
